alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 14 at 5:37AM CDT until June 18 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kansas... South Platte River at Atwood affecting Logan County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Platte River at Atwood, extending downstream through central and eastern Logan County. * WHEN...From early this morning to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Agricultural land floods along the river near Sterling. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.8 feet by early Thursday morning. Then the river should slowly fall Friday night through Saturday night. - Action stage is 9.5 feet. - Flood stage is 11.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
